title: Dead By April [Demo 2008] [All Songs - Best Quality]
description:
I discovered this band a couple months ago after seeing them so many times while searching for an old Cipher System torrent. Apparently they connect somehow with one or the other's former guitarist. After searching for a couple days, I realized that high(er) quality rips of these tracks were pretty rare, and after finding a couple rars on eMule andas well as some mp3s from the Visual Collection torrent, I decided to "normalize" the tracks with a little hard limiting, equalizing and gloss reduction. What came about was one of the most complete demos I've seen available, and definitely the best quality available.

I guess they're in the studio to record their debut, so check these out in the meantime. Bear with upload speeds, google WildBlue in the meantime. Then warn everyone you know to stay away from it.

320K Source MP3s are now 224k VBR MP3s.
192K Source MP3s are now 192k VBR MP3s.
128k Source MP3s are now edited 160k/192k VBR MP3s.

Tags include comments with original demo collection track numbers. Limited and unreliable info lead me to delete the predicted years for the tracks. Demo '08 just seemed so much easier.

These are the tracks included:

01. Lost
02. Falling Behind
03. Losing You
04. Angels of Clarity
05. Erased
06. A Promise
07. Stronger
08. Unhatable
09. Promise Me
10. Trapped
11. My Saviour
12. Carry Me
13. In My Arms
14. Leafs Falling
15. Painting Shadows [Webrip Edit]
16. Where I Belong [Webrip Edit]
17. I Made It [Webrip Edit]
18. Found Myself In You [LQ Webrip]
19. All of My Dreams ["Trapped" Incomplete Mono Demo]

Torrent Uploaded 09.04.10.
